com.example.SupportDecline.camera

类 CameraManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.SupportDecline.camera.CameraManager

  • public final class CameraManager
extends Object
    This object wraps the Camera service object and expects to be the only one talking to it. The implementation encapsulates the steps needed to take preview-sized images, which are used for both preview and decoding.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean closeDriver()
      Closes the camera driver if still in use.
      static CameraManager get()
      Gets the CameraManager singleton instance.
      static void init()
      Initializes this static object with the Context of the calling Activity.
      boolean openDriver(android.view.SurfaceHolder holder)
      Opens the mCamera driver and initializes the hardware parameters.
      void requestAutoFocus(android.os.Handler handler, int message)
      Asks the mCamera hardware to perform an autofocus.
      void requestPreviewFrame(android.os.Handler handler, int message)
      A single preview frame will be returned to the handler supplied.
      boolean setFlashLight(boolean open)
      打开或关闭闪光灯
      boolean startPreview()
      Asks the mCamera hardware to begin drawing preview frames to the screen.
      boolean stopPreview()
      Tells the mCamera to stop drawing preview frames.
      void takeShot(android.hardware.Camera.ShutterCallback shutterCallback, android.hardware.Camera.PictureCallback rawPictureCallback, android.hardware.Camera.PictureCallback jpegPictureCallback)
      Take shot.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initializes this static object with the Context of the calling Activity.

      • get

        public static CameraManager get()
        Gets the CameraManager singleton instance.
        返回:
        A reference to the CameraManager singleton.

      • openDriver

        public boolean openDriver(android.view.SurfaceHolder holder)
                   throws IOException
        Opens the mCamera driver and initializes the hardware parameters.
        参数:
        holder - The surface object which the mCamera will draw preview frames into.
        返回:
        the boolean
        抛出:
        IOException - Indicates the mCamera driver failed to open.

      • closeDriver

        public boolean closeDriver()
        Closes the camera driver if still in use.
        返回:
        the boolean

      • setFlashLight

        public boolean setFlashLight(boolean open)
        打开或关闭闪光灯
        参数:
        open - 控制是否打开
        返回:
        打开或关闭失败 ，则返回false。

      • startPreview

        public boolean startPreview()
        Asks the mCamera hardware to begin drawing preview frames to the screen.
        返回:
        the boolean

      • stopPreview

        public boolean stopPreview()
        Tells the mCamera to stop drawing preview frames.
        返回:
        the boolean

      • requestPreviewFrame

        public void requestPreviewFrame(android.os.Handler handler,
                                int message)
        A single preview frame will be returned to the handler supplied. The data will arrive as byte[] in the message.obj field, with width and height encoded as message.arg1 and message.arg2, respectively.
        参数:
        handler - The handler to send the message to.
        message - The what field of the message to be sent.

      • requestAutoFocus

        public void requestAutoFocus(android.os.Handler handler,
                             int message)
        Asks the mCamera hardware to perform an autofocus.
        参数:
        handler - The Handler to notify when the autofocus completes.
        message - The message to deliver.

      • takeShot

        public void takeShot(android.hardware.Camera.ShutterCallback shutterCallback,
                     android.hardware.Camera.PictureCallback rawPictureCallback,
                     android.hardware.Camera.PictureCallback jpegPictureCallback)
        Take shot.
        参数:
        shutterCallback - the shutter callback
        rawPictureCallback - the raw picture callback
        jpegPictureCallback - the jpeg picture callback
